title: raara seethaa
sahitya:
rAra sIta ramaNI manOhara



anupallavi



 nIraja nayana oka muddIra dhIra mungala



caraNam 1



 bangAru valvulu nE bAguga gaTTeda mari shrngArinci sEva jEsi kaugita jErceda

   

caraNam 2



 sAreku nutuDa kastUri tilakamu beTTeda sAramaina mukta hAramula diddEda

   

caraNam 3



 yOgamu nIpai anurAgamu bADeda vErE gati evaru shrI tyAgarAja vinuta
